name: MobStac
overview:
Established in 2009, MobStac is a privately-held company based out of Bangalore, India. Their mission is to enable content publishers â€“ website owners and bloggers â€“ reach out to the widest possible audience by facilitating the creation of mobile web content that can be consumed on any mobile device without compromising on the user experience. The company has fast evolving base of 3500+ publishers using a variety of platforms to serve content. The product is available in basic, pro and enterprise versions.

MobStac Their flagship product â€“ MobStac â€“ enables online content publishers reach out to their audience that consumes Web content using a variety of mobile devices including â€“ smartphones, PDAs and tablets.

MobStac supports a host of CMS platforms including â€“ Wordpress (self-hosted), BlogSpot, Drupal and Joomla. The mobile site/blog created can be redirected to your own sub-domain with custom navigation and menus. Video content (You Tube, Vimeo etc.), SEO and social media integration are some additional features that this product supports.

In terms of ad space monetization and analytics, MobStac provides 1-click integration with almost all popular ad networks including â€“ AdMob, InMobi, Chitika and offers integration with Google Analytics too. MobStacâ€™s ad server provides you the choice of delivering your own custom ads which can be further extended to an enterprise ad server that can handle heavy volumes and precision targeting.

Touchsite Another product by MobStac and soon to be launched at TechCrunch Disrupt 2011, Touchsite is the new interaction paradigm on tablet devices that helps content publishers present a lean-back, native app-like experience from within a browser. Users consuming content through their tablet devices can now experience the Web in a typical magazine-like fashion within a browser. Touchsite is currently available in private beta.
